name: Spamton Goes To Driving School
description:
( Deltarune by Toby Fox and his team )

A Deltarune fangame about Spamton going to driving school because why not?

Controls

  •  WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Hold Space to shoot money
  • PRESS F1 FOR [ oh god please help ]

Music by Toby Fox and SiIvaGunner:

BIG SHOT (itch.io Version) - Deltarune

MEGALOVANIA - DanceDanceRevolution A3

BIG SHOT
